ab.title: Genesis 36
ab.l: And these are the children of Esau. He is Edom.
Esau took his wives of the daughters of Canaan: Adah,daughter of Elon, the Hittite, and Oholibamah, daughterof Anah, daughter of Zibeon, the Hivite.
AndBasemath, daughter of Ishmael, sister of Nebaioth.
And Adah bore to Esau Eliphaz, and Basemathbore Reuel.
And Oholibamah boreJeush, and Jalam, and Korah. These arethe sons of Esau, who were born to him in the land of Canaan.

And Esau took his wives, and his sons,and his daughters, and all the souls of his house, andhis crowd, and all his livestock, and all his possessions, which he had gatheredin the land of Canaan. And he went to another land, from the face ofhis brother Jacob.
Because their possessions were to manyto dwell together. And the land of their sojourning was not ableto lift them because of their livestock.
So Esau dwelt in Mount Seir: Esau is Edom.
And these are the children of Esau, father of the Edom,in Mount Seir:
These are the namesof Esau’s sons: Eliphaz, son of Adah, wife of Esau, Reuel,son of Basemath, wife of Esau.
Andthe sons of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, and Gatam, and Kenaz.
And Timna was concubine toEliphaz Esau’s son, and she bore to Eliphaz Amalek. These arethe sons of Adah, Esau’s wife.
2nd And these were the sons of Oholibamah, daughter of Anah, daughterof Zibeon, Esau’s wife: and she bore to Esau Jeush,and Jalam, and Korah.
1st And theseare the sons of Reuel: Nahath, and Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah. Thesewere the sons of Basemath, Esau’s wife.
Theseare the chiefs of the sons of Esau: the sons of Eliphaz,Esau’s firstborn: chief Teman, chief Omar, chief Zepho, chief Kenaz,
Chief Korah, chief Gatam, and chief Amalek. These arethe chiefs of Eliphaz in the land of Edom, these are the sonsof Adah.
And these are the sons of Reuel,Esau’s son: chief Nahath, chief Zerah, chief Shammah, chief Mizzah.These are the chiefs of Reuel in the land of Edom. These arethe sons of Basemath, Esau’s wife.
And these arethe sons of Oholibamah, Esau’s wife: chief Jeush, chiefJalam, chief Korah. These are the chiefs of Oholibamah the daughter of Anah,Esau’s wife.
These are the sons of Esau,and these are their chiefs. That is Edom.
These arethe sons of Seir, the Horite, the inhabitants of the land:Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah,
And Dishon, andEzer, and Dishan. These are the chiefs of the Horites, the childrenof Seir in the land of Edom.
And the sonsof Lotan were Hori and Hemam, and Lotan’s sister is Timna.
And these are the children of Shobal: Alvan, and Manahath,and Ebal, Shepho, and Onam.
And these are the sonsof Zibeon: and Aiah, and Anah; that is Anah who found the wildhorses in the wilderness when he pastured the donkeys of Zibeon,his father.
And these are the sons of Anah: Dishon, andOholibamah, daughter of Anah.
And these are the sons of Dishon:Hemdan, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
These are the sonsof Ezer: Bilhan, and Zaavan, and Akan.
These are the sonsof Dishan: Uz, and Aran.
These are the chiefs of the Horites:chief Lotan, chief Shobal, chief Zibeon, chief Anah,
ChiefDishon, chief Ezer, chief Dishan. These are the chiefs of Hori,according to their chiefs in the land of Seir.
And these are the kingsthat reigned in the land of Edom, before there reigned any kingover the children of Israel.
And Bela the son of Beor reigned in Edom,and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
And Bela died, and Jobab, son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his place.
And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of the Temanites reignedin his place.
AndHusham died, and Hadad, son of Bedad reigned in his place,who smote Midian in the field of Moab, and the nameof his city was Avith.
And Hadad died, andand Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his place.
And Samlah died,and Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his place.And Shaul died, and Baal-Hanan, son of Achbor reigned in his place.
And Baal-Hanan, son of Achbor died,and Hadar reigned in his place, and the name of his city was Pau; andhis wife’s name was Mehetabel, daughter of Matred, daughter of Mezahab.
And these are the names of the chiefs of Esau, according to their families,by their places, by their names: chief Timnah, chief Alvah,chief Jetheth,
Chief Oholibamah, chief Elah, chiefPinon,
Chief Kenaz, chief Teman, chief Mibzar,
Chief Magdiel, chief Iram. These are the chiefs of Edom,according to their dwelling places in the land of their possession. That is Esau, fatherof Edom.

app.note: The order of these two verses was corrected by the copyist.
